description:
What are the biggest Lego sets ever made? From conversation-starting display pieces to towering monuments, this up-to-date guide tracks the biggest Legos of them all – namely the Lego sets with the most pieces. We can help you find rare behemoths to add to your collection, and we also list the newest additions to Lego’s giant hall of fame.

For clarity, we’re measuring a Lego set’s size by the number of pieces it contains, not merely its physical dimensions. Unsurprisingly, these ultra-large sets also include some of the most expensive Lego sets on the market - but size is no guarantee of quality: if you want our all time fa
title: The 28 biggest Lego sets ever made

description:
One Universes Beyond Magic: The Gathering card has been bumped up in value by another. The Fallout robot card Codsworth Handy Helper cost $5.30 on November 1, according to MTG Goldfish. But in the past two weeks it has leapt to $12.20, a rapid rise of 130%.

Continue reading Handy Fallout MTG card jumps in price by 130%
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates,
title: Handy Fallout MTG card jumps in price by 130%

description:
If you ask a friend what their favorite board game is and they respond with ‘Monopoly’ the thing to do is not force them to join you for a lengthy game of Root or Twilight Imperium. It’s also not to embark on a five minute rant about the many drawbacks of that property-trading exercise in misery, as hard to resist as that might be. What you should do with a friend so tragically unaware of the joys of modern board gaming, is sit them down for a quick game of Ticket to Ride.

Continue reading All aboard Ticket to Ride - still the greatest gateway board game
title: All aboard Ticket to Ride - still the greatest gateway board game

description:
When you think of Warhammer 40k, “bath-time” probably isn’t at the forefront of your mind. But at least two Space Marine chapters, the Iron Snakes of Ithaka and the Blood Angels, approach bath time with the same intensity that they approach all-out galactic war. Here’s what’s going on...

Continue reading Warhammer 40k: Why are so many Space Marines obsessed with baths?
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How to play Warhammer 40k , All about Warhammer 4
title: Warhammer 40k: Why are so many Space Marines obsessed with baths?

description:
7 Wonders Duel, one of the most popular two-player board games, has been adapted into a new Tolkien-themed tabletop title. It’s clear that plenty of DNA has been passed down, but The Lord of the Rings: Duel for Middle-earth does attempt to add its own spin to the original’s tried-and-tested rules. Unfortunately, even the smallest game mechanic can change the course of the future – and these new features both help and hinder the overall experience.

Continue reading New Lord of the Rings board game’s best
title: New Lord of the Rings board game’s best feature is also its biggest flaw

description:
What are the best Warhammer 40k games? From tabletop-flavored strategy titles to grungy first person shooters, Games Workshop’s grimdark universe has spawned 50+ videogames since Warhammer 40,000 first hit tabletops in 1987, many of which have, sadly, sucked - but we 40k fans are nothing if not persistent. These are the best Warhammer 40,000 games you can play right now, from recent releases to retro classics.

Continue reading The best Warhammer 40k games
MORE FROM WARGAMER: How to play Warhammer 40k ,
title: The best Warhammer 40k games

description:
The latest Humble RPG Book Bundle is offering 72 digital rulebooks, supplements, adventures, flip-maps, map-tiles, and more from the Pathfinder RPG, for just $30 (£23.16). Whether you’re a paid up member of the Pathfinder society, or a long-time DnD player who wants to move systems, this bundle is a bargain - that stack of goodies would ordinarily sell for $888 (£701).

Continue reading Get $888 of books for DnD’s biggest rival at a wild 96% discount
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: Get $888 of books for DnD’s biggest rival at a wild 96% discount

description:
DnD races represent the different species found in the world of Dungeons and Dragons. Your choice of DnD species (as they’re also called) decides your character’s size, speed, and some unique abilities based on their ancestry. The 2014 version of fifth edition also features Dungeons and Dragons races that grant a character certain ability score increases. This guide explains each of the 5e races, from the core Player’s Handbook options to the rarer species found in supplementary books.

Continue reading All DnD races and species explained
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: All DnD races and species explained
